name: Tale of a Lift Operator
description:
You have finally found a job. It's not good but it pays: stand in an elevator and take the Aristotomatons to where they need to go. They are dumb as rocks and almost never speak, so the work is lonely. But your family depends on your meagre income.

Tale of a Lift Operator is an exploration of employment and the mental toll of wage labour. It features 9 hours of game"play" (gamework?) and is not intended to necessarily be an enjoyable experience.

Features controller support. Use thumbsticks to move and left or right trigger to interact.

This game was developed in one week for the RMIT Game-a-Week program. The theme for the week was 'durational'.
